name: Joseph Simmons
description:
'''Joseph Ward Simmons''' (born November 14, 1964), better known by the stage name '''Run''',  '''Rev. Run''' or '''DJ Run''', is an American rapper, producer, DJ, and television personality. Simmons is one of the founding members of the influential [[Hip-hop|hip hop]] group [[Run-DMC]]. He is also a practicing [[Minister (Christianity)|minister]], known as '''Reverend Run'''.

He found new popularity in 2005 with his family's [[MTV]] reality show ''[[Run's House]]''.
